description: abbauf.com is a company profile of PT Abbauf Mulia Konsultan Teknologi, I created this when I was an intern at the company.
Company profile website for PT Estrong Nusantara Mandiri, developed during my internship at PT Abbauf Mulia Konsultan Teknologi.
Dailydone is a task management platform with the following features: Team collaboration, collaboration via links or email, and chat with task owners.
HayOrder is a platform for restaurant owners who do not yet have their own ordering system. We are here to help restaurant owners get their own ordering system.
DiaKawan is a platform that supports the marketing of products produced by DiaKawan in the form of healthy foods.
InfoHilang is a community platform for reporting and finding lost items, animals, or people. Let's help each other.
HayPlay is a platform for renting sports fields, and is currently still in the development stage.
